review: I have had this for a few weeks now and just love it. Easy to set up and very easy to use. Great product!
author: Samantha

review: I love it! Very Easy to use.
author: Amy Spinelli

review: Works great easy to set up.
author: gari brant

review: Turns your TV into a Smart TV. Works great!
author: Justin

review: With a very good connection, this works very well. It's faster than my WiFi Blu-Ray player and easier to use. The remote is intuitive.
author: Carol R.

review: The fire stick works really nice in my kitchen. I am disappointed that I cant get the Time Warner Cable App on it like I can my ROKU, but other than that, I think it works as well if not better than the ROKU I currently keep in my office. Its very easy to move around the house with.
author: suzie

review: Works better than I expected, very easy to set up.
author: John M Brenner

review: It does not work for a Kindle Fire
author: D. Bailey
